name: Introduction to Musicology
description: This class provides an overview of the discipline, including the history, theory, and techniques of musicology.

name: Music Theory
description: This class provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamentals of music theory and its application to musical compositions.

name: Music History
description: This class introduces students to the history of music from the middle ages to the present day.

name: Music Psychology
description: This class provides an introduction to the psychology of music and its effects on human behavior and cognition.

name: Ethnomusicology
description: This class provides an introduction to the study of the music of different cultures and its historical and cultural context.

name: Music Therapy
description: This class introduces the study of music therapy, including its history, theories, techniques, and clinical applications.
